## Bee.rebroadcastPendingTransaction() method

Rebroadcast already created transaction. This is mainly needed when your transaction fall off mempool from other reason is not incorporated into block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rebroadcastPendingTransaction(transactionHash: TransactionId | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<TransactionId>;
```
